name: AddEventGuests
description:
Add guests to an event with default or custom tickets.

Add guests to an event with the status "Going." By default, each guest receives one ticket of the default type. Specify custom ticket assignments if needed.

parameters.name: event_guest_details
parameters.description: JSON object including `event_api_id`, `guests` array with guest emails and names, and optional `ticket` or `tickets` for custom ticket assignments.

ticket.description: Optional. Assign a single ticket of the specified type to each guest. Cannot be used with `tickets` parameter.

tickets.description: Optional. Assign multiple tickets to each guest. Each guest receives all tickets in the array. Use this to add multiple tickets of the same or different types. Cannot be used with `ticket` parameter.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Luma API.

ticket.description: Optional. Assign a single ticket of the specified type to each guest. Cannot be used with `tickets` parameter.

tickets.description: Optional. Assign multiple tickets to each guest. Each guest receives all tickets in the array. Use this to add multiple tickets of the same or different types. Cannot be used with `ticket` parameter.
